SELECT u.user_company as user_company, r.refund_no as refund_no, r.refund_date as refund_date, r.pro_no as pro_no, p.pro_name as pro_name, o.order_qty as order_qty, r.refund_qty as refund_qty, p.pro_price as pro_price, p.pro_price * r.refund_qty as total_price, r.order_no as order_no, r.refund_note as refund_note, r.ware_no as ware_no
FROM tb_refund r JOIN tb_order o ON o.pro_no = r.pro_no AND o.order_no = r.order_no JOIN tb_product p ON p.pro_no = r.pro_no JOIN tb_userinfo u ON o.loginID = u.loginID AND u.user_type = 'C'
AND CONCAT(r.refund_no, r.pro_no, p.pro_name) REGEXP CONCAT('.', #{sname}, '.')
AND r.refund_no LIKE CONCAT('%', #{sname}, '%')
AND r.pro_no LIKE CONCAT('%', #{sname}, '%')
AND p.pro_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{sname} , '%')
AND r.refund_date >= date(#{fromDate}) AND r.refund_date <= date(#{toDate})+1
AND r.order_no is not null AND r.refund_confirm_cd = 0
ORDER BY r.refund_no DESC LIMIT #{pageIndex},#{pageSize}
